column4: no, a lot of the devs arent here, and they dont read the forums either.  malone is for bugs and wishlists.
yeah j/k not to many DEVS around anywhere, unless a small distro, but Gentoo has a few that hang there
oh, there are a couple aroudn here, and a fair few on IRC - but they're mostly coding, and bugfixing - not reading the user channel, per se...
I figured out at least one way not to see Totem ----> Alacarte Menu Editor and uncheck it, LMAO
